mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user (id, account, password, wages, number, name, dept_id, role_id, gender, telphone, address, id_card_no, national_id, education_id, institute, major, project_id) values (#{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{account,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{password,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{wages,jdbcType=DOUBLE}, #{number,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{deptId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{roleId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{gender,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{telphone,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{address,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{idCardNo,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{nationalId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{educationId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, #{institute,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{major,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{projectId,jdbcType=INTEGER})
mapper.select: SELECT u.id, u.account, u.wages, u.number, u.name, u.account, u.password, u.dept_id, u.gender, u.national_id, u.education_id, (SELECT name FROM dept WHERE id = u.dept_id) AS deptName, u.role_id, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN "男" WHEN 2 THEN "女" END AS genderName, u.telphone, u.address, u.id_card_no, (SELECT name FROM national WHERE id = u.national_id) AS nationalName, (SELECT name FROM education WHERE id = u.education_id) AS educationName, u.institute, major, (SELECT name FROM project WHERE id = u.project_id) AS project FROM user AS u

SELECT u.id, u.account, u.wages, u.number, u.name, u.account, u.password, u.dept_id, u.gender, u.national_id, u.education_id, (SELECT name FROM dept WHERE id = u.dept_id) AS deptName, u.role_id, u.gender, CASE u.gender WHEN 1 THEN "男" WHEN 2 THEN "女" END AS genderName, (SELECT name FROM national WHERE id = u.national_id) AS nationalName, (SELECT name FROM education WHERE id = u.education_id) AS educationName, u.telphone, u.address, u.id_card_no, (SELECT name FROM national WHERE id = u.national_id) AS national, (SELECT name FROM education WHERE id = u.education_id), u.institute, major, (SELECT name FROM project WHERE id = u.project_id) AS projectName FROM user AS u WHERE u.id = #{id}
mapper.update: UPDATE user SET account = #{account}, wages = #{wages}, name = #{name}, dept_id = #{deptId}, gender = #{gender}, telphone = #{telphone}, address = #{address}, id_card_no=#{idCardNo}, national_id=#{nationalId}, education_id=#{educationId}, institute = #{institute}, major = #{major} WHERE id = #{id}
mapper.select: SELECT * FROM user WHERE account = #{account} AND password = #{password} AND role_id = #{roleId}
